blur_detection.description: The invoice displays clear, sharp text with well-defined edges throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text sharpness is sufficient for accurate OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The invoice exhibits excellent contrast between the dark text and white background, enabling clear text recognition.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed as contrast is ideal for OCR processing.

glare_identification.description: No visible glare or reflections are present on the invoice that would impact text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from glare issues.

water_stains.description: No water damage, discoloration, or staining is visible on the invoice document.
water_stains.recommendation: No action needed as the document shows no signs of water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The invoice appears flat with no visible tears, creases, or folds that would distort text.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from physical damage.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the invoice are fully visible with no content appearing to be cut off from the frame.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the entire document is properly captured.

missing_sections.description: The invoice appears complete with all standard sections present including header, line items, totals, and footer.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as the document contains all expected invoice components.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions are blocking any content on the invoice.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the document is free from obstructions.
